statements: DELETE FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE production_id = 100 AND energy_source = 'Solar';
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergyInvestments WHERE investment_id = 500 AND investment_amount >= 10000;
DELETE FROM renewable_energy_investments WHERE investor_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_source = 'Coal' AND emission_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE location = 'New York' AND date = '2022-08-31';
DELETE FROM energy_production_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND renewable_source = 'Solar'
DELETE FROM energy_production WHERE production_type = 'Solar' AND production_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM renewable_investments WHERE impact_factor > 0.5 AND investment_amount > 50000;
